text:
He is well, quite well!

A dim room, Raskolnikov sits quietly.
Zossimov: “He is well, quite well!”
Raskolnikov (thought): “Why do they worry?”

---

A tense atmosphere, visitors crowd in.
Nastasya (whispering): “He looks like a wounded man.”
Raskolnikov (muttering): “I’m fine… just tired.”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov appears physically better but remains emotionally tormented and listless despite the presence of his mother and sister.
